CHAT.comment: The mood here is friendly , but not very interactive. Chi works almost entirely on her own , with comments and support from Mot. Mot does not play with the magnets much. EXP remains in the background , mostly answering questions directed to her. For the most part , Chi spends the time stacking things on the black base. She is intrigued , however , by the plastic objects which do not stick and wonders repeatedly what their purpose is here. Mot initiates brief scientific talk , asking Chi if she knows what the base is. Both appear to be satisfied by the answer , given by Mot , that it's a magnet. Video does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audio

u.a: insistent
video begins here
SIS is heard in the background
touches the sheep to the base but then takes it off and tries the orange man
touches the silver stick to a silver man which stands on the black base
touches the base magnet with her index finger
takes the wand from Mot and touches it to the man the way that Mot was
puts a washer on the base and it sticks
points to something on the table
picks up the yellow wand
takes the wand
moves the wand over the base
SIS talks in the background
SIS
holds the wand above the base with the objects on it; the wand causes the purple ball to move
<$=2> Mot is heard in talking to Sis in the background
takes all objects off the base except for the balls
moves the wand above the balls causing them to move
MOT has returned to the area with the magnets

g.ga: moving the balls on the base by waving the wand over them

u.a: shakes the wand
puts a paper clip on the base
tries to get the balls to move using the wand
tries to get the dime to stick to the wand
puts some objects on the base like the washer that sticks
puts the wand down and puts washers and silver men on the base; one of the washers sticks to the top of another washer but Chi takes it off and puts it on the base
picks up a green triangle and then puts it back down
touches a silver stick to a silver man
tries to remove an object from the black base using the silver stick
tries to pick a nut off the base with a silver stick
takes a silver man off the bottom of the base
stacks the silver men on top of each other
Chi wants to stack some of the silver men
a little whiny

one silver man stands on the base holding a foot of another silver man in each hand; Mot wants Chi to place her silver man on top of the inverted pyramid , in the middle of the two silver man standing on the one on the base
puts a silver man between two others , in the space indicated previously by Mot , and the silver man stays
puts another man on top
tries to put a washer on top but it causes them to fall
picks up the fallen silver man from the base and the table
removes <The Very Hungry Caterpillar> from the table
picks up the white sheep and sets it down again
picks up the red lego piece , touches it to the base and then sets it down again; picks up the orange man and sets it down
stacking men on top of each other
trying to keep them from falling
takes them down
tries to stack them again
points to the top silver man
the silver men fall over
takes all the men off the base
during the pause , Chi stacks the men again one on top of the other and then she takes them down
MOT moves her arm suddenly and Chi doesn't want Mot to do something , but the situation is unclear
puts the silver men on the base
has all the men standing on the base
takes the objects off the base
Chi takes all the objects off the base and Mot moves them to one side
picks up nuts and puts them on the base
still putting washers on
puts balls on top of the washers; when there are no more balls she puts silver men on top of the washers
takes the objects off the base
